body:
Hey guys, I need a cool minecraft intro for my youtube channel like most of the youtubers have here, if you could please make me one! PSSSSSSS:I have changed my youtube channel name to        DerpyGaming       

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Intro Please

replies.body: Well thre is an Avicus intro. LegoSean made it so ask him. If you need an intro for yourself ask someone else other then me.
replies.body_tagged: Well thre is an Avicus intro. LegoSean made it so ask him. If you need an intro for yourself ask someone else other then me.

replies.body:
Free Intro Template "Fracture Smash" + Download | Blender 3D Intro Template | [HD] [2014] [Dubstep] - YouTube

It's not specifically a 'Minecraft' intro but it works. (Currently using it) You can check out the guy who made it, he has tutorials and downloads for intros that can be customized to how you want.
